caption.p: CDC-recommended hygienic steps to avoid spreading COVID-19 (adapted from CDC, 2020).

tr.th: CDC hygienic steps to prevent spread

tr.td: Keep your hands clean by washing with soap and water for at least 20 seconds or using a hand sanitizer with at least 60% alcohol
Avoid touching your eyes, nose, and mouth
Cover your coughs and sneezes with tissues or your arm/sleeve and dispose of tissues in the trash
Avoid sharing items such as dishes and bedding and keep surfaces clean with disinfecting wipes
Wear a homemade mask whenever outside of home if risk of contact with others (e.g., groceries, gas, work)

fn.p: CDC, Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
